article_title: New and old friends join Maryland Symphony Orchestra for holiday show
article_text:

og.description: The Maryland Symphony Orchestra welcomed old friends, as well as new ones, during its annual "Home for the Holidays" concert at The Maryland Theatre Sunday afternoon.
